description: The Bobcat Express serves popular student destinations around Merced, as well as popular off campus apartments. Students can take the shuttle between their apartments and campus, or to spots such as Target, Amtrak, or Downtown.

weekday.stop: University Transit Center (UTC at UC Merced Main Campus)

description: C1 serves the Granville Apartments and campus. The bus also stops at a variety of stops along G Street.

weekday.stop: University Transit Center (UTC at UC Merced Main Campus)

description: C2 travels between campus and the village apartments. Also stopping at Merced College & Target.

weekday.stop: University Transit Center (UTC at UC Merced Main Campus)

description: The G line takes students to popular destinations around the G Street area, including the Merced Mall, Target, and Walmart. It also serves the Granville Apartments and M Street Village Apartments. You can also take this bus to Amtrak.

weekday.stop: University Transit Center (UTC at UC Merced Main Campus)
